Conversations/Bank/Taliferro/Banked Line: I'm not above making niceties with the little people. Hello to you.
Conversations/Bank/Taliferro/Gift Lines/: I graciously receive it. You're welcome.
Well well well. A birthday present? For me?
What am I supposed to do with your rubbish? Throw it out yourself!
This is a pleasing gift, [Ari]. I see you know how to treat nobility, hah!
Ah yes, this will do nicely for the time being. But I expect a meal fit for a king next time!
Oh, it's a gift? I accept.
What is this? I didn't order this!
It's a given that I deserve only the finest, but nonetheless... thank you, [Ari]. This will do nicely.
As a noble from the Capital, I have quite a developed palate... and judging by this gift, it seems you do as well.
